hydrosar-wm.description: HydroSAR water mapping product identifying surface water extent using SAR data for flood monitoring and wetland analysis.
hydrosar-wm.title: HydroSAR Water Map

rgb.description: RGB composite visualization combining SAR polarization channels for enhanced feature interpretation.
rgb.title: RGB Composite

rtc.description: Radiometric Terrain Corrected (RTC) SAR backscatter data normalized for terrain effects, providing calibrated intensity measurements for surface analysis.
rtc.title: RTC Backscatter
